definition: appearing genuine, but actually nasty or devious/see also 蔫土匪[nian1 tu3 fei3]

sentences.english: She soon wilted in the morning heat.
sentences.chinese: 在早晨的熱浪中，她很快就蔫兒了。

sentences.english: The potted flower has withered, and the leaves have all drooped.
sentences.chinese: 那盆花蔫兒了，葉子都倒垂了下來。
